name: Pacifism (Mikrin)
description:
In a dystopian future, where megacorporations reign supreme, an outlaw, an exiled executive, a time wizard, and a ninja come together... to drive a small spaceship through floating gates while being chased by pulsing red cubes. 

Destroyed enemies drop multipliers that increase your score.

Remember-- You didn't directly kill them, it's not your fault!
